description: Travellers between the islands, which are both currently Covid-19 free, will not have to self-isolate.
title: Coronavirus: Guernsey and Isle of Man 'air bridge' to start in July
title_page: Coronavirus: Guernsey and Isle of Man 'air bridge' to start in July - BBC News
maintext: Chief Minister of Guernsey Gavin St Pier said it would offer people from both territories "a chance to get away this summer without the need to self-isolate".
